alert.note: Alert for Faribault (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 6:54PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Faribault County through 745 PM CDT... At 654 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Delavan, or 22 miles east of Fairmont, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Easton around 705 PM CDT. Frost around 710 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Wells and Bricelyn. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between mile markers 115 and 142. U.S. Highway 169 between mile markers 8 and 23. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
